#include<stdio.h>
#include<stdlib.h>
int main()
{
	long long low,high,a,b,z;
	int count,t;
	
	while(1)
	{    a=1,b=2;
		count=0;
		scanf("%lld%lld",&low,&high);
		if(low==0&&high==0)
		return 0;
		  while(1)  
		{
			z=a+b;
			a=b;
			b=z;
			if(z>=low&&z<=high)
			count++;
			else
			{
				if(z>high)
			    {
			    	printf("%d\n",count);
				break;
				}
			}
		}
		
	}
	
	return 0;
}
